title: riocasinoback

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: NSFW content ahead.I know right? Imagine how I feel when I see a young girl getting gang banged.ðŸ˜… seriously though, how can they tolerate such hits to their face? Or in my mind how can a 18 year old girl take several *BBCs in? What has become of this world really. IMHO both powerslap and gang bang are unacceptable practices.*= big black cocks. lol.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I never heard of Powerslap as a sport, but I now know what it is, I absolutely think it is repulsing. Slapping each and let this be a paid professional sport? Slapping someone who cannot even defend themselves, that is just giving a concussion. There will be seriously injured people from this new sport. Definitely I can give it time until someone suffers a major brain injury. I am sickened that people would actually watch and why is this even legal in a country like the US.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: I love watching this of course , but I stand with you that this is a disrespect to human , and also this is life threatening game because i see the injuries happened towards others players .

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: I don't think the sport will last long because competitors will eventually develop a technique to knock-out their opponents in the first hit. You don't have to hit someone with a fist to knock them out.

comments.author: Dariona
comments.body: I am also for classical sports. Where you need years of training and there is etiquette and authority. I practiced karate myself as a child, I even have several belts)

comments.author: Nobility17
comments.body: Just watched a clip of the so called sport and mehn you need to see how someone slapped smoke out of someone's head. Not only did smoke come out of his head, but dude fell down straight up. I just imagine what damage he might have suffered all in the name of sport.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Thereâ€™s no defence play involved, itâ€™s just so dangerous. Iâ€™ve seen a few highlights lately & somebody is going to get seriously injured. Iâ€™m very surprised to see Dana White involved in something like this, I suppose he is the money man though & he will go where the money is.I really hope this sport is stopped soon, before there is a life changing brain injury.

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: Quote from: Nobility17 on January 23, 2023, 11:23:38 PMJust watched a clip of the so called sport and mehn you need to see how someone slapped smoke out of someone's head.That was not smoke. That was powder that had been applied to to the hand.

comments.author: Kath Bliss
comments.body: Slapping each other as a sport may be seen as disrespectful and is certainly not a productive way to stay in shape. It is much better to use activities like Brazilian jiu-jitsu and boxing to improve physical fitness and refine skills.

comments.author: Shielding2002
comments.body: Watched a video of the game. It's not fun to me I don't see why people should enjoy such sport.

comments.body: Quote from: riocasinoback on January 21, 2023, 12:28:07 AMonly i find it disrespecting for human? what a stupid sport to do. Sport is where people compete and train a lot.
